comments.body: nit: Seems to be a good place to include things like must be a non-optional feature and in GA.

I agree we probably will want to move some of the criteria for conformance tests here. But I am not going to just yet. Also, I expect soon to have an update to this that discusses optional features and profiles.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@   plane execution do not need to be part of conformance.
 - Behaviors should describe portable features. That is, they should be
   expected to work as described across vendor systems.
 - Behaviors should be defined so they are minimally constraining; if a detail is
   not needed for portability, it should be left out.
